values: my day today was very productive..nothing really to complain about EXCEPT the fact that people make it hard to do a lot of activities with their bad attitudes. i have the energy people just need to stop bitching and listen so shit can get done. (sorry for the language and venting) ANYWHO!!! so today i caught up on my sleep with the price of missing 6am practice (oo0ps) and being late to class (oo0ps again). i went to class. hung out at the letters on campus. won an otter pop race by being the fastest to rip them open and shove it down a guy's throat (for greek week). then i made a conscious effort to go to class (it was only a movie so i left...oo0ps again). went to eat at the hat (sooooo good). went back to my apt to rest for two seconds. then 909 class (look below). after that i went to greek 101 (for greek week again). then made my way over to the rec and saw some familiar faces and went to greek pyraid practice (our cheer/dance competition between all the greeks at ucr). we then took it outside until 2:30 ish. now im here. yeah...busy busy busy me. well the highlight of my day was our "company class" where 909ers and others who sign up for the class learn a dance for shits and giggles and to show off to their friends. today kyle (one of our coreographers) taught us a tight ass piece to TRILOGY by KELIS. here it is. so basically it was my favorite class. have a nice day. randomfact: The Neanderthal's brain was bigger than yours is. ..think about it.

its been a quite a ride this past quarter so far.

it started off really busy. doing my thang with 909 and pi phi. new set, new leadership role.

lets start with the bad so i can end on a good note.

with pi phi, ive always loved it but then things got bumpy. i know i can handle it but it a whole lottah work. with date party cancelled and greek pyramid around the corner...lord knows how thats gunna turn out.

yeah...

and 909 is amazing. i never would have imagined being a part of such a large dance group that makes you feel so welcomed and good about yourself...and 909 has done that for me. 

here it is in a nutshell...
<object width="425" height="350"><param name="movie" value="http://www.youtube.com/v/uRwmAG78pvU"></param><param name="wmode" value="transparent"></param><embed src="http://www.youtube.com/v/uRwmAG78pvU" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" wmode="transparent" width="425" height="350"></embed></object>




no complaining, no boasting, this is just how life is.

random fact: my greatest fear in life is being alone.

so basically (to quote stacey) everyone and their mommas are gunna be in vegas for new years.

and i'm not, because my parents love keeping me home even though were always in different rooms of the house so it really doesn't matter anyways. 

uuuuuugggggghhhhhhhh! 

soooo frustrating.

*january: the month when i was initiated as an active member of Pi Beta Phi *february: the greek week where we kicked everyone's ass in everything! *march: the most boring spring break ever *april: the first time celebrating april 20th *may: the month when i realized that theres no use to fight a battle that youre never gunna win and are the only one getting hurt in *june: the best friend visit ever *july: the first job i've ever had *august: the month i rolled around in 72 hundred dollar bills *september: the month when i moved into my first apartment and the first time i experienced formal sorority recruitment *october: the month when i was blessed to be accepted into the 909 hip hop dance troupe *november: the best celebrated birthday week ever, my first little, andrea! my first hip hop competition (that i have participated in), and the month i got my own car in riverside *december: the most relaxed and meaningful winter break i've ever had. i've learned: lesson 1: true love does really last a lifetime, but it evoles into differnt types of love that generate differnt feelings (this is why people think that they are not loved). i'm living proof that if love is pure and true between two people, whether they are together or just friends, love is all around. lesson 2: don't even talk to people with crazy (ex)girlfriends. lol lesson 3: stick to your passion. find some way to reconnect if you've lost touch. believe me it feel fufilling and is an outlet of all things negative. lesson 4: don't rush into things.

i know were hella cute my sister is the cutest thing ever. she told us that she was a big girl and wanted to take a nap by herself and this is how we foind her. this house down the street always does it big when it comes to decor. [there was even a plasma playing christmas movies like people we're gunna stand outside to watch. lol]

i've been stressing this break trying to figure out how to not be stressed anymore. lol funny huh?

but i've had a long time to think this break so far and i figured that i don't need to know what i want right now. i'm 19 years old and that is too young to know exactly who i wanna be with, what i want to do with my life, and most def too young to be stressing like i've been this past quarter. school and having fun is all i should be worrying about. 

im only young once why waste it? 

all of my life i've been putting eveyone else before me--spreading myself too thin--then wondering why i am the way i am. 

so adding on to my new years resolutions: live it up

i hate the lines of last minute christmas shopping.

...especially at k-mart.

i can't believe my cousin wanted a gift card from k-mart.

okay so i don't know if its just cuz i'm on break and i actually have time to do this, but i'm gunna make a serious effort to make this a regular thing again. that being said...i think i'm addicted to my laptop. i really do. i'm on aim constantly, myspace...i don't even wanna say how many times i check that thing, i'm on freindster again (only cuz of my cousin in the philppines and my cousin in sac), and i now i just remembered that i started a LJ. QUICK UPDATE OF MY LIFE: i am still in pi beta phi. i am now in 909 hip hop dance troupe. i have met some down to earth people that i am greatful for. i am still obsessed with mac make-up. i lost a bit of weight. i am currently trying to learn tagalog. i have my own apartment in riverside now. and lastly i love my new hooka (name: "off the") <--you figure it out. lately, i feel like i wanna be alone, but that makes me crave company even more. its like i can't make up my mind. i swear i'm so effin indecicive. maybe its a good thing that the new year is coming. new start. new opportunites. new things to learn. you know what i hate?? how i can never remember my new year resolutions when i go to evaluate myself at the end of the year. so this year i post it. that way i can get bitched out by people who read this if i don't comply with my resolutions, and i can refer back to this post at the end of the year lol. so here it is: NEW YEAR RESOLUTIONS: -get fit (i can't feel uncomfortable showing my tummy lol) -obtain and maintain a 3.0+ gpa the whole year -make a memorable positive difference in each organization i am involed with -be able to speak tagalog fluently -go on a trip with some friends -watch what i eat (meaning healthy, not literally) ...and for fun: JANUARY: -go snowboarding -do something spontaneous and daring -play ddr and break a sweat oh another thing thats new in my life: my myspace pictures thanks to ian, allison and chris :)


so go on myspace.com/joniestrella and comment. please and thank yous. okay that's it for now...

I am currently running on like 2 hours of sleep. no ones fault but my own, but im still tired as fuck. im supposed to be doing community service hours online, but my roommies and i decided to sneak off to the library and go online. haha! 

a lot has been going on. im already burnt out and finals week hasnt even officially started. ugh! i have one final on monday at 8am then a paper due on friday morning by 11am. how much does that suck? i have to wait a whole week to go home. but i guess its okay ill get a lot of sleep. 

so i tell him let me walk out of this car..and youre not gunna be a part of my life anymore. and what does he do? nothing. nothing at all. not one word. not the least bit of effort to keep me in his life. so here i am--a stronger person with a huge weight lifted of my shoulders. he has his new girlfriend and everything, but i dont give a fuck. its his loss and im not gunna suffer over his puck ass any more. its done. im done with him!

my eyes are getting droopy

i cant wait til spring break. thats soo much relaxation!! ahhh!! i cant wait! 

i think im starting to like you.. **BLUSH** lol

next quarter is gunna be good times. i can tell already! CRWT97 and PHIl002H!!! wooo!

so heres the story behind this...ive been trying for hella long to get on livejournal, first with my computer. the password was all fucked up and i couldnt log on. i think its the virus on my computer so i use my roommates computer and i still cant log in. so after hella days i try on my computer again and it still doesnt work..until today. i dont know what is the difference, cuz ive been doing the same shit over and over. whatever tho...im happy im back on..

im in the library doing homework...so heres a quck update since then.

- im coming home this weekend! woooo! im gunna show my roommates around the good ol' bay!
- this quarter is kicking my ass
- my sorority (and the two frats that we were paired up with) won GREEK WEEK at our school. we swept the whole week including the dance/cheer competition! wooo go us! ONE LOVE!
- im sick again..but im getting a lot better
- i had my first TJ experience! and i was TIIIGHT!
- im in the library studying..well i took a break to do my regular rounds (myspace, facebook, lj, email)
- i miss the people at home
- i actually really love it here in riverside
- me and my two roommates found an apartment for next year!


more later!!!

today marks the birth of one of the best friends ive ever had in my life. though times have changed, i still and always will cherish his friendship. HAPPY BIRTHDAY MR. PRESIDENT.

love,
your VICE forever

night out with the girls at the KA house..



..fucking fun as fuck!


what a nice picker upper. not like i really needed it that bad anyways. im good now. i just wish EVERYONE would understand how much shit i had to go thru this past month...but its just something that i had to go thru and experience first hand. thanx to all those that stuck by me and made me feel better while letting me know whats up when the time was right.

i hate when people say that they will be your best friend forever, then you go thru the roughest time in your life and they are gone. sure you were upset and wasnt trying to hear what you needed to hear..but fuck thats not what you need in times like that. you need a friend to tell you that youll be better and that they will come see you and that theyll be there if you need anything. once you calm down....thats when theyre supposed to tell you whats really going on. i dont know anything except im out of a best friend because i went thru the toughest thing ive ever had to go thru......

its hard to give and give and give and  never receive. oh and pretend to be okay with it. just to make the love of your life happy..cuz thats all there is left to do. i mean he deserves to be able to be single cuz hes a newly initiated frat boy and he feels like he was always the one bending over backwards for me, but it doesnt make me happy. it only makes me less sad than not having him at all. if thats what i have to endure for him to be mine later. im willing to do it. but again it still doesnt mean that im not sad. the bad thing is that everyone can see how down i am and that doesnt make me feel better, cuz i always end up explaining it. and all anyone has to say that itll be okay. and it will. i just wish it was sooner. i believe in our love so strongly that i know that his heart is with me and no one has shit on me. but its really hard when i dont feel right with anyone else but him. so here i am. stuck. stuck waiting for him, cuz thats what my heart feels is right. im happy for him tho. he got everything he wanted without giving up anything. and im here sleepless and still crying. but id do it for him....

HAPPY 2006 EVERYONE!

(its 12:31 am on Jan. 1, 2006 in the philipinnes)

december 31, 2005..damn maybe the most funfilled exciting emotional life changing year of my life is over.

i started the year with a brand new boyfriend that i love (to this day, now more than ever) loving senior year, dancing with ian, waiting for graduation. then graduation finally came, high school was over with. (i really will miss those days) i spent the summer doing all kinds of stuff prearing for my cotillion and the day i would have to say bye to my family and friends..and my baby. it was hard...way harder than i thought to be away from him. i started college...more parties than i was ussed to but made every one of them..met some tight ass people and have friends for life. joined a sorority..PI BETA PHI!! i love those girls dearly! pi phi for life!! then my cotillion quickly came by and it was the best birthday ever ever ever! i loved it so much and i will never forget it. it was all i imaginged and hoped it would be. the decorations were beautiful, every one looked sharp and sexy in the turquoise. haha! and i realized that i had the best best friend in the world. (thanx for everything lex) then i gave babe a puddin chest for his bday. it was so funny to see his face light up as his family was trying to figure out what it was. then the stress of first finals..which went better than i expected. now im here in the philippines celebrating my first christmas away from home and family and friends..(its over now..ill have next year) now im celebrating my new years with my mom, dad, sister, and a shit load of explosives (cuz thats all they do here on new years) i dont know itf ill have my hearing when i get back. back...to jakes arms at the airport. i cant wait! im hoing that ill start 2006 like i did last year...with him and happy.


its been a great year all in all...not a bad way to end it..but not the best either.

wow first christmas not at my lola's house. first christmas with out my parents and sister. first christmas where i was the only one opening gifts. first christmas where i saw 2 instead of 50 gifts exchanged.  first christmas where i played an active role in church. a lot of firsts...

i feel like a really bad person when i say this, but this is the first christmas (even first time ever) when i was fully attentive and prayed constatly at church. tonight i payed attention to every idea, eevry sentence, every word that was spoken in church. not one bit of day dreaming..nothing. i just prayed and listened..i must say...it feels good. i thought about everything, prayed that everything would turn out for the best, prayed that my family would have a safe trip, asked God to bless everyone in my life. no matter how big or how small someone has affected me (good or bad) i prayed for them. 

life goes by so fast that we never have time to reflect or see whats raelly going on until we have that quiet time. that significant point in our life that well always remember, where you just thought about your life and wherre it was going..

being here in the philippines has showed me how lucky i am to be so well off. i see whole families in the street sleeping on carboard and using a broken umbrella as theri roof. kids come up to me asking for money because thats all they can do. they sing and make noises just for one peso (like 2 cents). even my family..being well off here in the philippines..have no warm runnign water and no showers at all. all you have is a big bucket full of cold water and a cup to pour the water on your body. every street here looks like the ghetto. 

all some people have left is their families (if that) and God. so that makes me think..we shouldnt just see how lucky we are to have a better life, we should embrace it. embrace God. he is with everyone no matter the social status, color, race, gender, sexual orientation...he sees us as humans. one of his kind.

the priest said tonight in his homily.."God made him self human to be one with his people..not only by joining our humanity, but also raising us all up to his divinity."

i gave all the loose change i had to the kids that came up to me...every time.

man i dont know why i keep thinking the worst of situations. i think its cuz im so far away from everyone. im sorry baby for everything but you have to know that i did everything i did because i felt that i had to. i love you baby. i never wanna lose you or feel like im losing you ever again.

to all those that think that me and jake wont last...you dont know our situation and how much we love each other. im sorry for coming to you for comfort. youre supposed to be my friends and support me. not tell me something that isnt true and make me cry more....im already going crazy cuz im not with him this break..dont make it worse please.

im in the philippines and im bored as fuck. it sux being here alone. i cant wait til my parents and my sister get here. then well have a lot of fun nthen next thing i know.,.im going home! yay!! 

i gottah stay strong for my own sanity and safety....

i miss you and i love you baby..

so im here in the philippines. i have had a lot on my mind lately so i had plenty of time to think about on the plane ride over here. so here goes my bitching and my sorries.

-sorry allibob and ian that i missed your party. i really wish i could have made it. i was sick as fuck and my mom didnt let me go. HAPPY BIRTHDAY and I LOVE YOU GUYS.

-sorry alex for getting all pissed. ill miss you so much while im away

-i know jake loves me but it really hard to believe that when he says "no" to me. he has some other chick in san ho, and im jealous beyond belief. cuz hes denying something so special to me to be fair to her and not hurt her. i honestly dont care if she gets hurt. im his fuckin future wife. i love him so much and i dont wanna lose him..and thats what i feel like is happening. babe....dont let it happen. i cry every time i have to myself because of it. you hurt me so much that night. but i love you anyway. please come back to me. we can make long distance work. i swear..you dont know how much im hurting with out you.

-i wont be there until january 4th...so MERRY CHRISTMAS AND A HAPPY NEW YEAR TO ALL!

-happy birthday to my roommate!!

-i cant see the screen...im crying to much.

my first final is over with. and i have the rest of the week to stress about my next two finals followed by getting to the airport on time all on friday. woo!! haha

so i guess im going to the philippines for sure for sure now. im leaving in the afternoon of the 18th and ill be back on the 4th. so eveyone's christmas gift is gunna be from the philippines.. haha! anywho ill miss you all!!

ive been a lil down lately..i dont understand why.i guess i just miss people. select few more than the rest. one night i even had the sudden urge to watch chick flicks and eat ice cream. so instead watched the notebook, balled like a baby, and ate a whole pizza.

my sister said that she was poopin last night..it was sooo cute

i cant wait to go home.

time for lunch!

so im sitting in my bed for like 10 minutes with the covers on and listening to slow jams..this always puts me in the mood to think about my life and what im doing with it. ive come to the conclusion that i dont know what the fuck i want. i want to have someone here with me that cares about me, but it sux when the one that ive been wanting..hasnt opened up to me in the way i wish he would. i dont know if im willing to give up everything that i have and love to see if he can love me like he loved her. just for a chance that he might. i mean why take for granted the person that has showed me that he loves me with every inch of his body. i mean weve talked about spending the rest of our lives together. but then again he's on the other end of california hookin up with ghad knows how many other girls. i know he loves me..but i feel like this is my opportunity to take chances. and here comes the big twist..both are selfish. one told me that the only person that he doesnt want me hookin up with is the other guy...who wants me all to himself which means telling the first guy...UUUUUGGGGGHHH! I dont know what to effin do. i swear this is all i think about during my free time. its soooo annoying but i want to figure it out. all this and no one in riverside for me... all i have are my pi phi girls, my roommmate, my hallmate, and a few great guys who are like my brothers. oh yeh not to mention i go to U.C. ugly guys for the most part. man o man...


take me from this place and tell me that you love me..

-jake: with all the stupid things that we do to each other..we still love and come back to each other. i love you with all my heart and i cant wait to grow old with you baby!

-my best friend: youre always there for me whether i like it or not. and youre never gunna go away..i love it!! thanx for everything! love you!!!

-friends in general: i dont know where to start. each and every one of you has impacted me in a different way and i wouldnt be the person i am with out you guys. (p.s. thanx mattmatt for that wonderful video...i cant stop watching it!)

so i havent updated since i got here at UCR..here it goes.

saturday i move in. i didnt realize how much stuff i really brought til it was all in my room and taking up most of it. but i found a place for everything and i love my dorm. pictures of my friends. tons of pillows. and a great roommate...her name is christina handayan. shes just like me. not afraid to be loud and proud! haha! but yeh she has a brother that goes here and he's in a frat...ahhh yes!!!! that means she knows all the guys in this one frat that her brothers in. that means PARTY!!! yes my first night was sooo much fun. we went to the house and drank what they like to call a margarita. definatly wasnt 3 parts marg to 1 part taquila. but we played all these drinking games like kings and taps and high/low and FUCK THE DEALER...why did it have to be me that gets fucked over!?!? ahha! it was koo tho. i knew when to stop that night...boy o boy. that comes later!

sunday rolls around and we are hungry as fuck! so christina and i call up our friend fraser and we go out to ihop! mmm yummy! (side note: fraser's big toe is all fucked up cuz his roommate sirisak dropped his computer on it. so he can barely walk and has one slipper on. hahah!!) so we go to rite aid to pick up his prescription..then to radio shack to pick up printer cables. then to best buy to pick up an ethernet cable. we then go back to our dorm to set up everything. EUREKA! i have internet and can print things out!! haha! then we went to some presentations. then my family came by with a few essentials that we forgot and i said bye to them for the last time. then dinner. then spirit games. then back to the dorm to get ready for the party we were going to. then a mandatory town meeting. then we gather all the girls (E1W HONOR REBELS!) then we left for the party around 1045 er 11. i saw the same guys that were there the night before and a lot new people tooo...i heard someone say "hey theres the girl that was breaking off everyone last night" ahha i felt proud! it was really fun until i had 6 shots in 10 er 15 minutes. I WAS SOOOOO FUCKED UP. mayn i was throwing up so much i even had to go lie down in my friends car for the rest of the night...and it was just horribe. i had way too much to drink. yeh thats not happening again. i guess im glad that i got that out of my system now rather than later! haha! it sux tho cuz i was having this really great conversastion with this guy damian that i met the first night. but it was cute cuz he came to check up on me a lot...got me water and was trying to find me bread.. =) what a cutie pie!

so now im here waking up at noon. not that hung over. but hungry! haha! we have some presentations to go to today then we go clubbing tonight! yay! i get girly drinks tonight. NON-ALCOHOLIC! ahha! i cant wait to go dancing!! wooo!!!

kay thats it!! i miss you guys!!!! call me whenever!!!

p.s. i love my E1W HONORS REBELS! (christina, sara, julie!)

Your Seduction Style: Au Natural
You rank up there with your seduction skills, though you might not know it. That's because you're a natural at seduction. You don't realize your power! The root of your natural seduction power: your innocence and optimism. You're the type of person who happily plays around and creates a unique little world. Little do you know that your personal paradise is so appealing that it sucks people in. You find joy in everything - so is it any surprise that people find joy in you? You bring back the inner child in everyone you meet with your sincere and spontaneous ways. Your childlike (but not childish) behavior also inspires others to care for you. As a result, those who you befriend and date tend to be incredibly loyal to you.
What Kind of Seducer Are You?

How You Are In Love
You fall in love quickly and easily. And very often. In relationships, you tend to be a bit selfish. You tend to get very attached when you're with someone. You want to see your love all the time. You love your partner unconditionally and don't try to make them change. You stay in love for a long time, even if you aren't loved back. When you fall, you fall hard.
How Are You In Love?

today...

last night for some reason my lap top internet was being hella fast..so i was on it til like 2 am..forgetting that i had to get up early the next day for my gramma and grandpas wedding anniversary mass thingy. so yeh i had like 5 hours of sleep. 

so mass in the morning then i watched my family eat breakfast at carrows cuz kat and i were gunna go out to breakfast a lil bit later.. so kat picked me up and we went to ihop. we went all the way down mission and couldnt find the one in hayward so we just ended up in union city. wow that was fun! i love being with her! we never fail to laugh! then we went to rasputins. 

then to my house where i waited for jerry to pick me up. little did we know that RESTEY was with him! mayn i havent seen that guy for ages! so we went to stoneridge and found out that there was no build-a-bear there...so we walked around and the strangest thing happened..THE POWER WENT OUT! yeh the power..from macys to the nordstroms side of the mall..so all the sores just closed. it was sooo weird. ive never seen that in my life. so yeh we met up kat and her friend in the parking lot and we just chilled for a quick minute. we then headed to walnut creek to go to the build-a-bear..where i built a bulid-a-bear! it was fun! omg that place is soooo effin cool!! i need to go back and get a new outfilt for my new "daughbear" (daughter/bear). i would post pictures but PHOTO BUCKET IS STUPID! i love her....MAKENZIE ROSE ESTRELLA. shes hella fitted too! wow its like a mini me on my good days! ahha! come see me to see her...er maybe ill put pix up on myspace. who knows. so yeh then we went to pizzaria sfo in jack london square to visit kat at work and eat some damn good food at a damn good discount! haha! "you deserved the tip hunnie" 

now im at my house about to do laundry! yay..NOT!

so today i woke up to my sister. its was nice. minus the fact that i went to sleep only 6 hours prior to her lovely wake up call..."sleeping ate? wake up time now ate." so my mom my sister and i went to different places and bought more lil things for college. we got home from kelly paper, costco, anna linens, and economy asian market with such items as deodorant, spam, capri sun, bottled water, batteries, easy mac, chocolate milk, towels, and my favorite DINNER! as i was sitting at home..my favorite brother texted me! MATTMATT!!! he suggested we kick it (seeing how im leaving on thursday night). so since i had hella stuff to do for my cotillion (plus my moms errands) he graciously accompanied me. we went to drop off a cd to kat and we got a parking right in front of dina's studio (that hardly happens!). then the bank for my mom (where we found parking that was oober close). then to michaels to find some cardstock paper (and again parking right in front of the door)..i ended up finding hella cheap turquoise ribbon and a sillouette of a butterfly for free! (my sneaky ass traced it in the store!! haha!) then we didnt know what to do so we went to bed bath and beyond to look at dorm stuff (you guessed it...hella good ass parking). as soon as we walk in we see that theres a sale on hella nice ass comfortable soft pillows. it was like a cross between a squishy pillow and those pillows that you put your hand on it and the imprint of your hand stays for a lil. yeh that kind! it was only $6! mattmatt bought it for me! i guess its was a going away present! anywho i love it and im gunan sleep with it every night! haha! then we went to cold stones (this amazed me the most...you can never get parking right in front of cold stones on a-street..but yeh we did!! literally righ tin fron of the door.) we took a hella tight picture while we were waiting in line...mattmatt looked like a straight ghost! maybe my guardian angel!! ahha!see----> then on top of the people who work at cold stones LOVE US! we both ordered a "like it" and mattmatt got a "got to have it" and i got a "love it" for the price of 2 "like it"s. it was wonderous! then we went home and he played with my sister as i had him approve a couple of things for my cotillion. it was more of him letting me know that it didnt look hella ugly and that i did a good job! so yay! then he had to go cuz he has school early tomorrow! but i had a lottah fun! so did jayna cuz after he left jayna said "wer maah maah go? maah maahh wer are you?" ahah me and me mom were hella laughing! thanx for everything mattmatt! i love you!! so after he left. i had to edit, crop and resize all 100+ pictures for the slide show for my cotillion. i thought it was supposed to be a suprise for me..NOT ANYMORE! and it took FOREVER! i just finished a few minutes ago. _________ schedule for tomorrow: 7am- wake up 8am- mass for my lolo and lola's anniversary 10am- breakfast with kat! 11:30am/12pm ish- day with jerry (i cant wait to build a build-a-bear!) whenever i get back- laundry..ugh! and get together the things i've packed so far.

my phone situation couldnt be better. we ge tto cingular last night RIGHT before it closed. That guy was very nice for letting  us in! then he let my dad upgrade a week early. and reaplaced all of our sim cards  (i didnt have one anymore cuz i lost it duh! and my parents' sim cards were old) anywho i was gunna get this nice lookin black samsung camera phone. but my dad wanted to see the new ericsson S710 (the one that swings open) and he was like this is tight..and my mom said NO hella quick and she told the salesman that we would get the samsung..but my dad was like NO WELL GET THE ERICSSON THANK YOU. and the salesman rung it up. wow i love my dad! he got me a hella nice ass phone and his upgrade. that just means that id give him my update next year. so ill have this phone for 3 years..i dont care!!!!

so it hit me. my life is about to change in approx. a week and a half. 

i almost feel like im holding on to everything thats familiar to me by a rope. then everytime i lose the people that mean the most to me, the rope gets cut a little bit. jake left..the rope got cut. alex is gunna leave in a week. the rope is gunna be cut even more. the day i leave for college (22nd) im losing my friends and rest of my family. thats a huge cut. then as i move in im hanging on to one last strand. as soon as my parents and sister leave my dorm on the 24th...the rope is completely cut in two and im dropped in this whole new experience called college and independence. its scary...but i cant help but be excited!
